wf/BBQ.en:
[Marco Bascinio]
A special Item... not easily found in Kingdom Rune Midgard!
No one can resist the temptation of...
Happy taste!!
Good for gifts, good for you!
A gorgeous fancy looking chocolate is 5000z per each!

[Marco Bascinio]
A special Item... not easily found in Kingdom Rune Midgard!

Happy taste!!

xP/BBQ.en:
[Marco Bascinio]
No way! This chocolate has
the spirit of its maker!
That's why I don't sell more than five to each person..
If you really need more...
Come back again. How many do you want?

[Marco Bascinio]
Hmm, interesting... How come you don't buy any of them
You will regret!
Take them with you now. Or... you won't get those chocolates without sweat!
Think over and over! And, visit me again!

xv/BBQ.en:
[Marco Bascinio]
Heheheh, What have I told you??
5 for each, five!! just for once
I don't sell more than that. Especially that many... nope
Gobbling up as much as you want is not a good idea.
Chocolate is not a potion, you know!!!

x//BBQ.en:
[Marco Bascinio]
Oh, boy~~! I'm afraid you need more zeny..
Why don't you ask your friend for some zenies...?
and bring them with you again!
I'm telling you~! I'm not here forever!

and let her help you with heavy items...
She can keep them for you~!

like this one? If you need more..
visite me anytime...!

y//BBQ.en:
[Esder Rose]
Wow! You got all the stuff what you need!
Hmm.. Actually, my boyfriend is next to me watching me..
So, can I give you the chocolate that I've made for sale?
You know.. you will have to wait some time if I make another one now!
So... Are you OK with that?

zP/BBQ.en:
[Esder Rose]
Here you are. Materials that you've handed to me
will be used making other chocolates...
Enjoy your chocolate! Or you can present it to somebody! Right?
Hehe... Wish you have a happy life~

zf/BBQ.en:
[Esder Rose]
You know what? Chocolates that my boyfriend sells are from me!!
I made them by myself.
I've learned it from foreign countries.
zf/BBQ.pt:
[Esder Rose]
You know what? Chocolates that my boyfriend sells are from me!!

zv/BBQ.en:
[Esder Rose]
You know.. In other countries, there's a tradition
presenting chocolates to a person that I love..
And, I gave him a nice chocolate!
That's why he started to make chocolates in great numbers and distribute.

But, I feel great when they buy thing I made.
I really like that.

0v/BBQ.en:

People are giving chocolates as presents to their lovers.
Now is the time!! Have you heard of it?
If you are in love with someone..
get the person a chocolate and propose~!

0//BBQ.en:
[Esder Rose]
If you collect materials for making chocolates,
I'll make one for you. 
There are many chocolates already made... My boyfriend is selling them.
But, buying those instant chocolate won't be as much worthy as I make with your hearty materials!
Don't you think so?

[Charl Orleang]
Wow, This small dirty place
feels like heaven... because of you!!
If you don't mind
Can I ask you why you are here?
Please....

Your chocolate will bear
my beautiful sense of art and it will

bear glaring light..
And, nobody will resist your mystic love!!

[Charl Orleang]
Uno, Dos, Tre, Quatro.....

Just an ordinary chocolate turns into an art of history..
Hugged it with heart,
Softly changed, Roughly changed,
An art of centuries...!!

Ahahahahah, Ahahaha. This is so nice...

[Charl Orleang]

4f/BBQ.en:
[Charl Orleang]

I don't make
a chocolate
without emotion.

are not letting me go!

5v/BBQ.en:
[Charl Orleang]
Ohhh, You are so bad. Your words..

What can I do...
to seize your mind..!
